_meanings:
{@--1@} Any article which
serves to make anything 
complete, an ingredient.

{@--2@} (Hence)
Condiment or seasoning for food (as
mustard, pepper &c.).

{@--4@} Any article or
implement of household use (such
as a broomstick); <ls>Y. 1. 83</ls>; <ls n="Y.">2. 193</ls>;
<ls>Ms. 3. 68</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 66</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 150.</ls>
